DataElement.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Not Administered Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The text response that provides the reason a patient did not receive treatment post disease progression.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Disease Progression Therapeutic Procedure Negation Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The worsening of a disease over time._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:The worsening of a disease over time.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not; used for negation of a word or group of words.:Given.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
